level.text: Each grant award shall be in the form of a written grant agreement between the Director and the awardee that is consistent with those statutes and regulations that apply to the grant.
The grant agreement shall include, but not be limited to, the following:
A statement of the purpose of the grant;
The amount of the grant award;

Reference to provisions of statutes, rules, and regulations (including provisions of this chapter) particularly applicable to the grantee, as well as a statement that the grantee shall comply will all applicable Federal and District laws and regulations;
The scope of work for the grant, a description of any service or products required to be delivered under the grant, and a schedule of expected performance;
Reporting requirements, both program and financial;
The name, address and telephone number of the Grant Officer in the Agency, and of the agent for the grantee;
The address to which all written communications from the Agency to the grantee may be sent, including periodic payments due under the grant, and
A provision that the grant may be modified by agreement of both parties.
